name: PSYCHO Demo
description:
PSYCHO

A Game by Jayland Gaming Studios (A Thirteen Year Old Boy)

This game is a horror/puzzle game made in RPG Maker MV. It is not that scary, however, and so it prides itself on being a puzzle game.

Demo Features (Full Game Will Have Much More):

Seven Interesting Levels

Unique Character Development

Interesting Story Shrouded In Mystery

*An Entry For the Indie Game Making Contest 2018
